BEFORE:
qkv = self.to_qkv(x)
        q, k, v = rearrange(qkv, 'b (qkv heads c) h w -> qkv b heads c (h w)', heads = self.heads, qkv=3)
AFTER:
x = self.norm(x)
        qkv = self.to_qkv(x).chunk(3, dim = 1)
        q, k, v = map(lambda t: rearrange(t, 'b (heads c) h w -> b heads c (h w)', heads = self.heads), (q, k, v))
        q = q * self.scale
